events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified the issue as related to refund due to a wrong item being sent.
Your case has been assigned to a customer support agent who will assist you further.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the incorrect item. I'll help you arrange a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I've attached images showing the wrong product that was delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for handling this promptly. I appreciate your assistance.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please check your account for confirmation within the next few days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I have received the refund successfully. Thanks again for the great support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing the case now; feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
